name: Walk up through the obstacles
description:
Test your reaction and wits!

You can choose two ways: test yourself on power and gain as many points as possible, or compete with your friends and be the first to reach the finish line with the most points!

I'll give you a couple of tips:

1. Catch more stars to get closer to victory.

2. Click the screen faster to gain speed, or slower to slow down.

Whichever path you choose, in any case, we will help you relax and escape from the eternally absorbing bustle, or dilute your boredom and cheer up!

The game is very easy to operate and has clear functionality.

Any ideas, questions or recommendations? Write to us about it on this mailbox idea@omajestygames.com

We tried our best :)

Leave your rating about the game!
